Patricia Renee' Thomas (amụrụ n'afọ 1995) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese foto, na ónyé nkụzi nka nke bi na Philadelphia.
Patricia Renee 'Thomas gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Tyler School of Art
Ọ natara Masters ya na Fine Arts site na Mahadum nké Pennsylvania's Weitzman School of Design na asambodo na agụmakwụkwọ.
Ọrụ mbụ Thomas na-enyocha isiokwu nke ịma mma na ihe osise ọdịda anyanwụ mgbè ọ na-ezo aka n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ojii

Ka ọrụ ahụ na-agbasawanye, Patricia na-ele ányà na ihe ndị ọ hụrụ na ihe nketa, na-akpọghachi nwa agbọghọ Black ya ka ọ degharịa ihe ncheta ma mepụta ohere màkà ntụgharị uche na ezumike. Ọrụ Thomas na-ezo aka na mgbasa ozi ogologo ógè nke iji oji na mmekọrịta ahụ na mmegbu akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Africa America.
Thomas bụ ónyé nkụzi na-ese ihe na eserese ugbu a na Mahadum Temple's Tyler School of Art and Architecture Continuing Education
. Ọ bụkwa ónyé nkụzi nka màrà mma ugbu a na Church of the Advocate na North Philadelphia.
